title: AJ Pritchard shuts down Saffron Barker Strictly curse rumours as he gushes over girlfriend
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Strictly Come Dancing professional AJ Pritchard has firmly denied rumours that something is going on between him and his his dance partner, Saffron Barker ,

The two were coupled together for this year's Strictly, and speculation instantly began that they would spark up a romance.

But AJ, 24, has spoken out about the rumours and confirmed he is not dating the YouTuber, 19.

In fact, AJ is dating someone else, 22-year-old fellow dancer Abbie Quinnen.

And he has gushed over her in a new interview, saying she has completely changed his life.

(Image: Dave Benett/Getty Images)

AJ told OK! Magazine : "Everyone wants to know about my relationship status, but I'm very happy with Abbie.

"It gives me a different outlook on life as I’ve always worked hard, but now I also have a personal life, too.

"Abbie’s brought balance to my life."

The smitten pair look the perfect match in photos together, although Piers Morgan clearly doesn't think so.

(Image: PA)

(Image: BBC/Guy Levy)

Abbie revealed she was "very happy" when the Good Morning Britain presenter said AJ was punching above his weight.

AJ talked about how it felt when Piers asked him and Saffron if they were "at it".

"You know you’re going to be asked certain questions, even when you say you don’t want to answer", he explained.

"When it comes to that sort of thing it doesn’t really bother me because I know who I am, so does Abbie."

(Image: SIPA USA/PA Images)

Abbie even said that she supports her boyfriend's friendship with Saffron.

"I hope AJ stays friends with her, and I get to know her more", she said.

"They’re so good together."

She added: "As I’m a dancer, too, I understand that things can look a bit dodgy – I have to dance with guys all the time as well."

Meanwhile, AJ called Saffron a "great partner" who is "so hard-working and a genuine fan of Strictly."

(Image: aj11ace/Instagram)

He added: "This is probably my favourite year on the show."

AJ has previously been partnered with The Saturday's Mollie King and gymnast Claudia Fragapane.

AJ also lifted the lift on how it felt to no longer be the only famous brother - now that his brother Curtis has shot to fame on Love Island.

Curtis is still dating his partner on the show, Maura Higgins.

(Image: Instagram)

It transpired that this was part of the brothers' plan so they could start working on projects together.

"We needed him to become ‘famous’ so we could do the things we’ve always wanted to do," he said.

But he added: "We do get quite competitive and I was annoyed when he overtook me on Instagram with more followers!"
description: AJ Pritchard has introduced his dancer girlfriend Abbie Quinnen, but even she has said he and Saffron are "good together"
